Twitter      Facebook      Pinterest              https://www.readyseteat.com/recipes-Italian-Broccoli-6044        Copy Link         Email      Print             				November 22, 2023 			        Italian Broccoli   Broccoli and tomato recipe combining frozen broccoli with Italian flavored tomatoes and finished with Italian blend cheese   Minutes Prep Time: 10 Minutes Total Time: 15 Servings: 6  Difficulty:  	            easy 	            	                  								10 								   								MinutesPrep Time 							     								15 								   								MinutesTotal Time 							     								6 								   								Servings 							        ADD ITEMS TO SHOPPING LIST REMOVE FROM SHOPPING LIST                    Powered by Basketful                  BasketfulPrivacy Policy  |  Terms of Use            Ready to get cooking?       ADD ITEMS TO SHOPPING LIST REMOVE FROM SHOPPING LIST           Powered by Basketful          Privacy Policy |          Terms of Use                    Save Recipe         Print      Rate      Share                         Ingredients            		Ingredients 	    1 bag (14.4 oz each) Birds Eye® Tender Broccoli Cuts   3 tablespoons water   1 can (14.5 oz each) Hunt's® Diced Tomatoes with Basil, Garlic and Oregano, drained   1/2 cup finely shredded Italian blend or mozzarella cheese             Nutrition Information      62 calories, 6g         Carbs     View complete nutrition information       ×   Italian Broccoli             Nutrition Information           Nutrient Amount % Daily Value   Calcium  					99 			mg 			  		10%	   Carbohydrate  					6 			g 			  		2%	   Cholesterol  					7 			mg 			  		2%	   Total Fat  					2 			g 			  		3%	   Iron    		2%	   Calories  					62 			kcal 			  		3%	   Sodium  					202 			mg 			  		8%	   Protein  					4 			g 			  		9%	   Saturated Fat  					1 			g 			  		6%	   Sugars  					2 			g 			  		0	   Vitamin C  					28 			mg 			  		47%	               Directions                    Directions          Step one Place broccoli and water in medium skillet; cover.  Cook over high heat 5 minutes or until broccoli is tender and water is almost evaporated.   Step two Add drained tomatoes; cook 2 to 3 minutes more or until hot.  Sprinkle with cheese.      		Tips	 	  For gluten free preparation, confirm all recipe ingredients are gluten free by reading product labels each time you make this recipe.
